channel.title: First click pickup?
channel.description: How can i make it so when you click to pickup a object off the ground, you only have to click once.

item.title: First click pickup?
item.dc:creator: @Reforced _Reforced
item.description:
@Reforced wrote:

Here is a easier way.

Add these two methods.

public void scanPickup() { if (absX == apickupx && absY == apickupy) { if (ItemHandler.itemExists(apickupid, absX, absY)) { int itemAmount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(apickupid, apickupx, apickupy); if (addItem(apickupid, itemAmount)) { ItemHandler.removeItem(apickupid, apickupx, apickupy, itemAmount); } } else if (hasntLoggedin){ } resetPickup(); } } public void resetPickup(){ apickupid = -1; apickupx = -1; apickupy = -1; }

Then declare these.

public int apickupid = -1; public int apickupx = -1; public int apickupy = -1; public boolean hasntLoggedin = false;

Then add this in the process method.

if(apickupid > 0){ scanPickup(); }

Replace your entire case 236 with this.

				int itemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
				int itemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
				int itemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
				apickupid = itemID;
				apickupx = itemX;
				apickupy = itemY;

That should work.

Read full topic

item.title: First click pickup?
item.dc:creator: @Element_SoftwareTM Element SoftwareTM
item.description:
@Element_SoftwareTM wrote:

[quote=“kojomba, post:4, topic:218675”]Step 1:

In process() (your 500ms boolean) add

scanPickup();

Step 2:

Find your pickup item packet

case 236:

and replace the contents of it with

int itemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); int itemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int itemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); apickupid = itemID; apickupx = itemX; apickupy = itemY;

It should look something like this:

case 236: //pickup item int itemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); int itemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int itemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); apickupid = itemID; apickupx = itemX; apickupy = itemY; break;

Now declare all this.

[code]public int apickupid = -1;
public int apickupx = -1;
public int apickupy = -1;

public void scanPickup()
{
if (absX == apickupx && absY == apickupy)
{
if (ItemHandler.itemExists(apickupid, absX, absY))
{
int itemAmount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(apickupid, apickupx, apickupy);
if (addItem(apickupid, itemAmount))
{//only removes the item when has enough space!
ItemHandler.removeItem(apickupid, apickupx, apickupy, itemAmount);
removeGroundItem(apickupx, apickupy, apickupid);
apickupid = -1;
apickupx = -1;
apickupy = -1;
}
}
else if (hasntLoggedin){
sendMessage(“Too late, its gone!”);
apickupid = -1;
apickupx = -1;
apickupy = -1;
}
}
}
public boolean hasntLoggedin = false;[/code]

Now in your loading packet

case 121:

add

hasntLoggedin = true;

And your done![/quote]
Thats client side correct?

Read full topic

item.title: First click pickup?
item.dc:creator: @kojomba kojomba
item.description:
@kojomba wrote:

Step 1:

In process() (your 500ms boolean) add

scanPickup();

Step 2:

Find your pickup item packet

case 236:

and replace the contents of it with

int itemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); int itemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int itemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); apickupid = itemID; apickupx = itemX; apickupy = itemY;

It should look something like this:

case 236: //pickup item int itemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); int itemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int itemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); apickupid = itemID; apickupx = itemX; apickupy = itemY; break;

Now declare all this.

[code]public int apickupid = -1;
public int apickupx = -1;
public int apickupy = -1;

public void scanPickup()
{
if (absX == apickupx && absY == apickupy)
{
if (ItemHandler.itemExists(apickupid, absX, absY))
{
int itemAmount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(apickupid, apickupx, apickupy);
if (addItem(apickupid, itemAmount))
{//only removes the item when has enough space!
ItemHandler.removeItem(apickupid, apickupx, apickupy, itemAmount);
removeGroundItem(apickupx, apickupy, apickupid);
apickupid = -1;
apickupx = -1;
apickupy = -1;
}
}
else if (hasntLoggedin){
sendMessage(“Too late, its gone!”);
apickupid = -1;
apickupx = -1;
apickupy = -1;
}
}
}
public boolean hasntLoggedin = false;[/code]

Now in your loading packet

case 121:

add

hasntLoggedin = true;

And your done!

Read full topic
